name: Brain Buddies Academy: A Family Learning Adventure
name_original: Brain Buddies Academy: A Family Learning Adventure
description:
Welcome to your first day of Brain Buddies Academy! 

Brain Buddies Academy: A Family Learning Adventure is an education game that aims to engage parents with the curriculum that their children learn in school. Answer various trivia questions regarding the Ontario curriculum ranging from Kindergarten to Grade 8. Do you have what it takes to be a Brain Buddy?

This is a snapshot of a project being worked on by Parents Engaged in Education and a team of students from Ontario Tech University as part of the Capstone Study Project course. 

It is recommended to play in fullscreen.
